attributes.action: ALL POLITICAL PARTY DONATIONS SHOULD GO TO A CENTRAL REGISTER AND THE FUNDS SHOULD BE DIVIDED INTO EQUAL PORTIONS AND GIVEN TO EACH OF THE POLITICAL P
attributes.additional_details: This would ensure that wealthy donors could contribute to a democratic process without putting undue influence or corrupt practice. It would also  help improve engagement  of the people and  every individual will   feel that  his single personal contribution has equal resource allocation.  stop any two facedness
